text: Ntubona bamwe babwirwa bati:- ni mukingire	amaboko yanyu muhagarike	amasengesho	yanyu,	kandi	mutange	imperezwa	zanyu	gusa, mugihe	bategetswe kurwana	n’umurwi umwe muribo	waratinye abantu nk’ugutinya	Imana	canke	kugira	ubwoba gusumba,	baca	bavuga	bati:- Muremyi wacu, ni kuki wadutegetse kurwana? Iyo udutevya kugeza kukiringo kigufiya gutya, nawe nuvuge uti:- amahirwe yo kw’Isi ni makeyi cane, ariko amahirwe yo	mw’Ijuru niyo meza gusumba kubantu batinya	Imana yabo y’ukuri,	kandi ntimuzo hemukirwa	naho	koba	ari	akanyuzi kari	hagati y’umwanya w’igishishwa c’icamwa c’umutende
